definition: Zhang Wentian (1900-1976), CCP party leader and theorist
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

sentences.english: Chang Wen-tien, too, participated in Kao Kang's factional activities.
sentences.chinese: 張聞天也參加了高崗的宗派活動。

sentences.english: Zhang Wentain's thinking on the masses route is extremely rich.
sentences.chinese: 張聞天關於羣衆路線的思想極爲豐富。

sentences.english: However, Huili Conference had influenced Zhang Wentian and Peng Dehuai to some extent.
sentences.chinese: 會理會議也給張聞天和彭德懷帶來一定影響。

sentences.english: The fourth part points out its great significance.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分指出張聞天黨建思想的重大意義。

sentences.english: Zhang Wentian was an outstanding proletarian revolutionist and theorist.
sentences.chinese: 張聞天是一位傑出的無產階級革命家和理論家。

sentences.english: Zhang Wen day is a great proletarian revolutionist not only.
sentences.chinese: 張聞天不僅是一個偉大的無產階級革命家。
